analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.distributeReservedTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol#1581-1610):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen < token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen()) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol#1589-1590)
	- i < crowdsale.joinedCrowdsalesLen() (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol#1594-1601)
	- batch = token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen().minus(distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol#1603-1609)
	- reservedAddr = token.reservedTokensDestinations(j) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- allocatedBonusInTokens = token.getReservedTokens(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- percentsOfTokensUnit = token.getReservedPercentageUnit(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- percentsOfTokensDecimals = token.getReservedPercentageDecimals(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- token.mint(reservedAddr,allocatedBonusInPercentage) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- token.mint(reservedAddr,allocatedBonusInTokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	- token.finalizeReservedAddress(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen (/unique_chucks/43/0x9f4713c943f8524418b17d7308c909935f53e775.sol)
